alert.note: Alert for Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 12:01PM MST until January 06 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Storm total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph through this evening. * WHERE...Upper Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will continue to be very difficult at times with areas of blowing snow significantly reducing visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
